name: buzzer.playSong
content:
Plays an array of notes one after the other at specified durations for each one.

`buzzer.playSong()` works just like `buzzer.playNotes`, except now you can determine the duration for each note, which allows you to create music like what you would normally hear.

palette_params.name: notes
palette_params.description: Array that has smaller arrays inside it, each smaller array has two items in it: The note to play, and the duration of that note.

palette_params.name: tempo
palette_params.description: The tempo at which to play the notes.

short_description: Plays an array of notes one after the other at specified durations for each one.
